metadata.title: CVE-2023-44488 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: VP9 in libvpx before 1.13.1 mishandles widths, leading to a crash relatedto encoding.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
